sentences.en: If you compare ruby and diamond, the latterly more valuable.
sentences.cn: 若你比较红宝石和钻石, 则后者更珍贵.

sentences.en: Medium to full - bodied dry red wine in dark ruby color.
sentences.cn: 酒体中度至丰满干红葡萄酒,深宝石红色泽.

sentences.en: Ruby was going through the preparations for the meal gently.
sentences.cn: 鲁比轻手轻脚地准备着晚饭.

sentences.en: Ruby: Very much. The room was comfy and the service was great.
sentences.cn: 鲁比: 非常愉快. 房间很舒适,服务也很好.

sentences.en: Ruby: Yes, and I really care about you, too.
sentences.cn: 茹比: 嗯, 而我真的也很在乎你.

sentences.en: Secret book of emergency demand GBA emulator bag monster ruby!
sentences.cn: 急求GBA模拟器口袋怪兽红宝石秘籍!

sentences.en: She is wearing a small ruby earring.
sentences.cn: 她戴着一枚红宝石小耳环.

sentences.en: Tasting Notes: Deep red ruby colour with garnet at the rim.
sentences.cn: 风格: 深厚的红宝石色,边缘呈现出石榴红的色泽.

sentences.en: The emerald, the ruby, and the topaz gleam upon its dress.
sentences.cn: 那翠绿的 、 艳红的 、 嫩黄色的羽毛闪闪发光.

sentences.en: The experimental results of PTM Q - switehing ruby laser are given.
sentences.cn: 本文给出了PTM调Q红宝石的实验结果.

sentences.en: The little ruby lights went out.
sentences.cn: 那些红宝石般的小红灯熄灭了.

sentences.en: The Ruby interpreter parses a program as a sequence of tokens.
sentences.cn: Ruby解释器根据符号顺序解析程序的.

sentences.en: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fittings.
sentences.cn: 射击场被一排排深红色的灯光设备从下面照亮了.

sentences.en: They got misty-eyed listening to records of Ruby Murray singing "Danny Boy".
sentences.cn: 聆听着唱片里鲁比·默里演唱《丹尼男孩》的时候，他们泪眼模糊。

phrases.tran_cn: 红宝石激光器；红宝石雷射

trans.tran_cn: 红宝石，红玉，红宝石色，深红色，<英>细铅字，红葡萄酒
